Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.version.Application

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getApplication

        public static Application getApplication(URL _versionUrl,
                         URL _rootUrl,
                         List<String> _classpathElements)
                                  throws InstallationException
        null is returned, of the version file could not be opened and read.
        Parameters:
        _versionUrl - URL of the version file which defines the application
        _rootUrl - root URL where the source files are located (for local files); URL of the class file (if source is in a Jar file)
        _classpathElements - elements of the class path
        Returns:
        application instance with all version information
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if version XML file could not be parsed

      • getApplicationFromSource

        public static Application getApplicationFromSource(File _versionFile,
                                   List<String> _classpathElements,
                                   File _eFapsDir,
                                   File _outputDir,
                                   List<String> _includes,
                                   List<String> _excludes,
                                   Map<String,String> _file2typeMapping)
                                            throws InstallationException
        Returns the application definition read from a source directory.
        Parameters:
        _versionFile - version file which defines the application
        _classpathElements - class path elements (required to compile)
        _eFapsDir - root directory with the XML installation files
        _outputDir - directory used as target for generated code
        _includes - list of includes; if null DEFAULT_INCLUDES are used
        _excludes - list of excludes; if null DEFAULT_EXCLUDES are used
        _file2typeMapping - mapping of file extension to type; if null DEFAULT_TYPE_MAPPING is used
        Returns:
        application instance with all version information
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if version file could not be read or opened

      • getFiles

        protected static String[] getFiles(File _eFapsDir,
                List<String> _includes,
                List<String> _excludes)
        Uses the _includes and _excludes together with the root directory _eFapsDir to get all related and matched files.
        Parameters:
        _eFapsDir - root directory where the file are located
        _includes - defines includes; if not specified the default value is **/*.xml
        _excludes - defines excludes; if not specified the default value is **/version.xml
        Returns:
        array of file names
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_INCLUDES, DEFAULT_EXCLUDES

      • getApplicationFromClassPath

        public static Application getApplicationFromClassPath(String _application,
                                      List<String> _classpath)
                                               throws InstallationException
        Method to get the applications from the class path.
        Parameters:
        _application - searched application in the class path
        _classpath - class path (list of the complete class path)
        Returns:
        List of applications
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if the install.xml file in the class path could not be accessed

      • getApplicationsFromClassPath

        public static Map<String,Application> getApplicationsFromClassPath(String _application,
                                                   List<String> _classpath)
                                                            throws InstallationException
        Method to get all applications from the class path.
        Parameters:
        _application - searched application in the class path
        _classpath - class path (list of the complete class path)
        Returns:
        List of applications
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if the install.xml file in the class path could not be accessed

      • getApplicationFromJarFile

        public static Application getApplicationFromJarFile(File _jarFile,
                                    List<String> _classpath)
                                             throws InstallationException
        Returns the application read from given JAR file _jarFile.
        Parameters:
        _jarFile - JAR file with the application to install
        _classpath - class path (required to compile)
        Returns:
        application instance
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if application could not be fetched from the JAR file or the version XML file could not be parsed

      • compileAll

        public static void compileAll(String _userName,
              List<String> _classpath,
              boolean _addRuntimeClassPath)
                       throws InstallationException
        Compiles the ESJP's and all Cascade Styles Sheets within eFaps.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of logged in user for which the compile is done (could be also null)
        _classpath - class path elements
        _addRuntimeClassPath - must the classpath from the runtime be added to the classpath also
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if reload cache of compile failed
        See Also:
        #compileAll(String)

      • compileAll

              boolean _addRuntimeClassPath)
                throws InstallationException
        Compiles the ESJP's and all Cascade Styles Sheets within eFaps.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of logged in user for which the compile is done (could be also null)
        _addRuntimeClassPath - must the classpath from the runtime be added to the classpath also
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if reload cache of compile failed

      • install

        public void install(String _userName,
           String _password,
           Set<Profile> _profiles)
             throws InstallationException
        Installs current application including existing dependencies.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of logged in user
        _password - password of logged in user
        _profiles - set of profile to be applied
        Throws:
        InstallationException - for all cases the installation failed
        See Also:
        #install(String, String, boolean)

      • install

        public void install(String _userName,
           String _password,
           Set<Profile> _profiles,
           Boolean _compile)
             throws InstallationException
        Installs current application including existing dependencies.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of logged in user
        _password - password of logged in user
        _profiles - set of profile to be applied
        _compile - compile during the install/ if null the setting from the version.xml applies
        Throws:
        InstallationException - for all cases the installation failed
        See Also:
        #install(String, String, boolean)

      • install

        protected void install(String _userName,
           String _password,
           Set<Profile> _profiles,
           Boolean _compile,
           boolean _withDependency)
                throws InstallationException
        For each version in versions is tested, if it is already installed. If not already installed, the version is installed. Only if _withDependency is defined, also the dependencies are installed.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of the installation user
        _password - password of the installation user
        _profiles - set of profile to be applied
        _compile - compile during the install/ if null the setting from the version.xml applies
        _withDependency - must the dependency also installed?
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if installation failed

      • updateLastVersion

        public void updateLastVersion(String _userName,
                     String _password,
                     Set<Profile> _profiles)
                       throws Exception
        Updates the last installed version.
        Parameters:
        _userName - name of logged in user
        _password - password of logged in user
        _profiles - Profiles to be applied
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • storeVersion

        protected void storeVersion(String _userName,
                Long _version)
                     throws InstallationException
        Store for this application that the version is already installed. If data model in the local type cache is not loaded (because, e.g., it is a new kernel install), the version numbers are cached.
        The first time, the version type could be get from the type cache, all cached versions are stored in eFaps.
        Parameters:
        _userName - logged in user name
        _version - version id to store
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if version could not be stored

public void addDependency(Dependency _dependency)
        Parameters:
        _dependency - dependency

                    throws InstallationException
        Reloads the eFaps cache.
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if reload of the cache failed

public void addVersion(ApplicationVersion _version)

      • addURL

        public void addURL(URL _url,
          String _type)

        _type - type of the URL

      • addClassPathFile

        @CallMethod(pattern="install/files/file")
public void addClassPathFile(@CallParam(pattern="install/files/file",attributeName="name")
                               String _classPathFile,
                               @CallParam(pattern="install/files/file",attributeName="type")
                               String _type)
                      throws MalformedURLException
        Searches for the given file name (parameter _classPathFile) in the class path and adds them as URL to the list of XML installation / update / definition files (install).
        Parameters:
        _classPathFile - file name from the class path to add
        _type - type of the file to be added
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - on error with the URL
        See Also:
        addURL(URL, String)

      • getRootUrl

        public URL getRootUrl()
        Returns the root URL where the source is located. For local sources it is an URL to a directory, for a Jar file it is the URL to the Jar file.
        Returns:
        value of instance variable rootUrl
